projectsMetaDescription: Manage all your construction projects in one place with BuildTrack Pro's project management tools.
createProjectDescription: Add a new project to your portfolio by filling out the information below.
createProjectMetaDescription: Create a new construction project with BuildTrack Pro's project creation wizard.
createProjectError: There was an error creating your project. Please try again.
noProjectsMatchFilters: Try adjusting your search filters to find what you're looking for.
createYourFirstProject: Get started by creating your first project to track your construction activities.
projectDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project and its objectives
basicDetailsDescription: Enter the essential information about your project
basicDetailsTip: A thorough project description will help your team understand the scope and objectives more clearly.
aiProjectTypeSuggestion: Based on your project name and description, we recommend:
industryAdditionalInfo: Enter specific requirements or regulations related to this industry
addressTip: Enter the full address or start typing to get suggestions
addressSearchPlaceholder: Start typing to search for an address...
weatherImpactDisclaimer: This analysis is based on historical data and general patterns. Actual conditions may vary.
address2Placeholder: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.
siteDetailsDescription: Additional information about the construction site
siteConditionsPlaceholder: Describe existing site conditions, soil type, etc.
locationDescription: Provide the location details for your project
locationTip: Accurate location information helps with logistics planning and local regulatory compliance.
teamDescription: Add team members to your project and assign roles
addTeamMembersDescription: Start by adding team members to your project with their specific roles and permissions.
projectManagerRequired: A Project Manager is required for the project
teamTip: Make sure your team has clear roles and responsibilities for efficient project execution.

teamRoleDescriptions.project_manager: Has full control over the project with ability to edit, invite members, and approve changes.
teamRoleDescriptions.supervisor: Can manage tasks and approve changes but cannot edit all project details.
teamRoleDescriptions.team_member: Can view project details and complete assigned tasks.
teamRoleDescriptions.consultant: Limited access for external consultants to provide expertise.
teamRoleDescriptions.client: Client access to view progress and communicate but not edit.
teamRoleDescriptions.guest: View-only access for stakeholders who need visibility.

milestonesDescription: Define key milestones for your project
addMilestonesDescription: Add key milestones to track your project's progress and set clear targets.
milestoneDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what needs to be accomplished for this milestone
deliverablePlaceholder: Add a deliverable and press Enter
deliverableHint: Press Enter to add multiple deliverables
milestonesTip: Well-defined milestones help track progress and keep the project on schedule.
budgetDescription: Set up the project budget and financial details
selectCategory: Select a category to view details
noBudgetDefined: No budget has been defined yet
budgetTip: Include a contingency percentage for unexpected expenses to make your budget more resilient.
templateDescription: Start from scratch or use a template as a starting point
startFromScratchDescription: Create a completely new project with custom details
templateTip: Templates can save time and ensure consistency across similar projects.
reviewDescription: Review all project details before finalizing
reviewTip: Carefully review all information to ensure accuracy before creating the project.

validation.nameLength: Project name must be at least 3 characters
validation.endDateAfterStart: Target end date must be after start date
validation.siteAreaPositive: Site area must be a positive number
validation.dateAfterStart: Date must be after project start date
validation.dateBeforeEnd: Date must be before project end date
